Title: Universal Grid
Description: WPF Overlay Grid for static and dynamic grid layouts.

Project Description
WPF Overlay Grid for static and dynamic grid layouts.

This project provides help for designers in terms of an Overlay Grid with transparent background.

Some features at a glance:
  • static grids (fixed width and height)
  • dynamic grids (fixed column and row count)
  • conditional visibility of grids
  • vertical and horizontal alignment
  • gutter margins
  • baseline grid with font chooser
  • visibility and color settings
  • templates for saving and sharing of grid definitions

The project is still in beta state, so please report bugs and feel free to contribute patches.
